data.name: Hiveswap Friendsim
data.detailed_description:
Next Time, on Pesterquest


About the Game

You just crash-landed on Alternia, and you’re DESPERATE for friendship! Anyone will do...wait, who are those two trolls approaching you?

The Hiveswap Friendsim is a quick, loosely-canonical visual novel adventure following the efforts of the unnamed protagonist (that’s you!) to survive and maybe even thrive on the harsh surface of ALTERNIA. Set in the time of Hiveswap: Act 1, this episodic visual novel, written by Homestuck creator Andrew Hussie, is sure to satisfy Homestuck and Hiveswap fans who are eager for a darker stroll across the Alternian landscape.

Purchasing Hiveswap Friendsim unlocks all 18 volumes of the visual novel adventure.

data.short_description: You just crash-landed on Alternia, and you’re DESPERATE for friendship! Anyone will do...wait, who are those two trolls approaching you? A darkly comedic episodic visual novel set in the Homestuck/Hiveswap universe.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP or later
  • Processor: 1.66 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any DirectX-compatible card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows XP or later
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any DirectX-compatible card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X Tiger (10.4) or later
  • Processor: 1.66 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS X Tiger (10.4) or later
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: x86 or compatible processor
  • Processor: 1.66 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: x86 or compatible processor
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
